textBeforeTable: For GC3 members, the companion document is available in the GC3 Members Area. For non-GC3 members, please contact us. Below is a summary table of the twelve initiatives/organizations reviewed: Some sector-specific projects exist that are supporting retailers in advancing safer chemicals and products throughout supply chains. However, these tend to be projects that are part of organizations or initiatives that are more broadly addressing sustainability in retail or manufacturing industries. The GC3 “Engaging Retailers in the Adoption of Safer Products” Project Group (Retailer Group) has developed an inventory of initiatives and organizations relevant to retailers that are advancing sustainability with a focus on safer chemicals and products. The GC3 Retailer Group developed this inventory to understand the landscape of activities in this area.
